statements: SELECT * FROM LivestockHealthRecords;
SELECT id, animal_name, species FROM LivestockHealthRecords;
SELECT animal_name, health_status FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE health_status = 'Healthy';
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE species = 'Cow' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT animal_name, weight FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE weight > 500 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE species = 'Cow' ORDER BY weight DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, animal_name, health_status, vaccination_schedule FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE weight > 500 AND health_status = 'Healthy'
SELECT animal_name, species, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth,'%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_dob FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE vaccination_schedule LIKE '%Annual%'
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE health_status = 'Sick' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, species, weight FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE vaccination_schedule IS NULL AND weight < 300
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_records;
SELECT animal_id, health_condition FROM livestock_health_records;
SELECT record_id, health_condition, vaccination_status FROM livestock_health_records WHERE vaccination_status = 'Completed';
SELECT animal_id, vaccine_name, vaccine_date FROM vaccination_schedules ORDER BY vaccine_date DESC;
SELECT animal_id, health_condition, vaccination_status FROM livestock_health_records WHERE health_condition = 'Good' AND vaccination_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_records WHERE animal_id = 1;
SELECT health_condition, vaccination_status FROM livestock_health_records WHERE health_condition = 'Good' ORDER BY animal_id DESC;
SELECT animal_id, health_condition, vaccination_status FROM livestock_health_records WHERE vaccination_status = 'Completed' AND health_condition = 'Satisfactory';
SELECT record_id, animal_id, health_condition FROM livestock_health_records WHERE health_condition LIKE '%Poor%' AND vaccination_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_schedules WHERE vaccine_date >= '2022-01-01' AND vaccine_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT livestock_id, name, species FROM Livestock WHERE species = 'Cow';
SELECT livestock_id, name, species FROM Livestock ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT h.record_date, h.temperature, l.name FROM HealthRecords h JOIN Livestock l ON h.livestock_id = l.livestock_id WHERE h.temperature > 39.0;
SELECT vs.livestock_id, vs.vaccine_name, vs.due_date FROM VaccinationSchedule vs JOIN Livestock l ON vs.livestock_id = l.livestock_id WHERE l.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Livestock ORDER BY name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, species, gender FROM Livestock WHERE species='Cow' AND gender='Male'
SELECT name, weight FROM Livestock INNER JOIN HealthRecords ON Livestock.livestock_id = HealthRecords.livestock_id WHERE temperature > 38.5

SELECT Livestock.name, HealthRecords.record_date, VaccinationSchedule.vaccine_name FROM Livestock LEFT JOIN HealthRecords ON Livestock.livestock_id = HealthRecords.livestock_id LEFT JOIN VaccinationSchedule ON Livestock.livestock_id = VaccinationSchedule.livestock_id WHERE VaccinationSchedule.due_date <= '2023-12-31' AND completed = FALSE

SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM Livestock LEFT JOIN HealthRecords ON Livestock.livestock_id = HealthRecords.livestock_id GROUP BY Livestock.name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY num_records DESC
SELECT * FROM livestock;
SELECT livestock_id, livestock_name, species FROM livestock WHERE health_status='Healthy';
SELECT AVG(livestock_id) AS avg_id FROM livestock;
SELECT vet_id, vet_name, specialization FROM veterinarian ORDER BY vet_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, contact_number FROM location WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT livestock_name, birth_date, species FROM livestock WHERE health_status = 'Healthy';
SELECT * FROM vaccination_log WHERE vaccination_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vet_name, specialization FROM veterinarian ORDER BY vet_name DESC;
SELECT livestock_name, birth_date, species, veterinarian_name FROM livestock INNER JOIN vaccination_log ON livestock.livestock_id = vaccination_log.livestock_id;
SELECT * FROM location WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT name, age, weight FROM Livestock WHERE species='Cow';
SELECT id, name, health_status FROM Livestock ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vaccination WHERE date_administered >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, livestock_id, date, condition FROM Health_Record WHERE condition='Healthy' AND temperature >= 39.0;
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE species = 'Cow';
SELECT id, name, age, weight FROM Livestock ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, species, age, weight FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5 AND weight > 200 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT L.name, V.vaccine_name, V.date_administered FROM Livestock AS L INNER JOIN Vaccination AS V ON L.id = V.livestock_id WHERE V.date_administered > '2021-01-01';
SELECT U.username, U.email, F.location_name FROM User AS U LEFT JOIN Farm_Location AS F ON U.id = F.id WHERE U.username = 'john_doe';
